title: Non-verbal Hypnosis / Dr. Paret
description:
Our true nature is non-verbal. Dr Paret and his students demonstrate the powerful nonverbal techniques. With non-verbal communication you can create emotional states and influence people.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
